name: Love Squared
description:
A game made in Ludum Dare 41

Welcome to your local co-op dating sim! You and a friend work together to give rapid fire responses to questions at a speed dating night. Player 1 chooses the first half of a sentence, and Player 2 the second half… at the same time!

Who will be your Perfect Match?

Design, Art, Audio - Jacob Leaney @jacobjamesaus

Design, Programming - Jack Wilson @t_jackwilson
